com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller

Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guidi.customermicroservice.controller.CustomerController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/")
public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the customer controller class, responsible to process the requests received and return the response. The root path for this controller is /api/
    Author:
    Alex Guidi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> create(Customer customer)
      This methods receive POST calls from /v1/customer to create a new customer in mongodb.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> delete(java.lang.String idNumber)
      This methods receive DELETE calls from /v1/customer/{idNumber} and delete the customer passed by parameter idNumber if it exists in mongodb.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> findAll(int page, int size, java.lang.String sort, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This method receive GET calls from /api/v1/customer and return a list of customers.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> findById(java.lang.String idNumber)
      This method receive GET calls from /api/v1/customer/{idNumber} and return the customer passed by parameter idNumber if it exists in mongodb.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/customer")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> findAll(@RequestParam(value="page")
                                                                                                                     int page,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="size")
                                                                                                                     int size,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="sort")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String sort,
                                                                                                                     org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        This method receive GET calls from /api/v1/customer and return a list of customers. The pagination is based by the parameters page, size and sort passed in the request.
        Parameters:
        page -
        size -
        sort -
        pageable -
        Returns:
        GenericResponse

      • findById

        @GetMapping(value="/v1/customer/{idNumber}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> findById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String idNumber)
        This method receive GET calls from /api/v1/customer/{idNumber} and return the customer passed by parameter idNumber if it exists in mongodb. The customer is returned in payload field inside of GenericResponse
        Parameters:
        idNumber -
        Returns:
        GenericResponse

      • create

        @PostMapping(value="/v1/customer")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> create(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                     Customer customer)
        This methods receive POST calls from /v1/customer to create a new customer in mongodb. The customer is created based in the json inside of body request. The customer created is returned in payload field in GenericResponse.
        Parameters:
        customer -
        Returns:
        GenericResponse

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="/v1/customer/{idNumber}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericResponse<Customer>> delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String idNumber)
        This methods receive DELETE calls from /v1/customer/{idNumber} and delete the customer passed by parameter idNumber if it exists in mongodb. The deleted customer is returned in payload field in GenericResponse
        Parameters:
        idNumber -
        Returns:
        GenericResponse
